description: A tough green helmet built from durable materials, designed as armor for combat robots, but suitable for humans.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A dull gray steel helmet with a skirt on the rear to protect against shrapnel and provide extra coverage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick helmet, encasing the entire head, with a large reflective visor, allowing a wide field of vision.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
